title: My Web development journey
body:
Web development has always been very fascinating to me.
Many people's lives are based on this technology.
I am currently learning the MERN stack.
As I'm still new to this, I'll keep my blog short and keep updating over time.

These are the resources I referred to:
(I'm still working on getting these links to point to the website as this data is stored in JSON. I'll most probably use markdown to latex.)

HTML Crash Course:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UB1O30fR-EE

CSS Crash Course:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yfoY53QXEnI

Javascript Playlist:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLlmE1rs89GfJx3nvnlVhZGwtsigUER41p
(This playlist was made by my friend Tanmay who is a fellow web developer from my Undergrad College)


React:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cUxeGkcC9gZD-Tvwfod2gaISzfRiP9d


MongoDB:  Learnt this through college course. I will try to find a good playlist and add it here.

Node and Express:  Haven't yet learnt as of 23rd April 2021 :)
author: Durvesh
